headline: My Piece of the American Id
abstract: Does equality in the age of Trump mean I can be irrationally angry, too?
lead_paragraph: The president’s freewheeling racism, emanating year after year from the top of the American political order, has made me more hostile toward white folks and whiteness than I’ve ever been in my life. Despite the fact that I’ve written provocatively (so I’m told) about racial matters for years, this hostility is new — and I’m increasingly unafraid to express it.
